# Pin GraphQL dependencies to avoid version conflicts
# Nautobot 3.0.2 requires graphene-django<3.3.0,>=3.2.3
# which requires: graphene<4,>=3.0; graphql-relay<4,>=3.1.1
# Pin to minimum versions that include resolve_maybe_thunk (3.2.0+)

graphql-relay>=3.2.0,<4.0
